ip_address.title: IP Address
ip_address.description: Optional. Use only if you have static IP address. If unset a UDP broadcast will be used to find the unit.

username.title: Username
username.description: Optional. Set this to go through remote Pentair servers. Format should be: Pentair: XX-XX-XX

password.title: Password
password.description: Optional. Only needed if going through Pentair servers.

hidden_circuits.title: Hidden Circuits
hidden_circuits.description: Optional. Comma-seperated list of circuit names to hide.

hidePoolTemperatureSensor.title: Hide Pool Temperature Sensor
hidePoolTemperatureSensor.description: Hides the pool temperature sensor, which is redundant if you are showing pool thermostat.

hideSpaTemperatureSensor.title: Hide Spa Temperature Sensor
hideSpaTemperatureSensor.description: Hides the spa temperature sensor, which is redundant if you are showing spa thermostat.

hidePoolThermostat.title: Hide Pool Thermostat
hidePoolThermostat.description: Hides the pool thermostat (aka, pool heater).

hideSpaThermostat.title: Hide Spa Thermostat
hideSpaThermostat.description: Hides the spa thermostat (aka, spa heater).

statusPollingSeconds.title: Status Polling (Seconds)
statusPollingSeconds.description: Status (such as pool on, lights, temperatures, etc) is fetched on demand as needed, and is also polled for use in automations. By default this is done every 60 seconds.

createLightColorSwitches.title: Create Switches for Colors
createLightColorSwitches.description: Create switches for changing the color of the lights. Turning the switch on will send a command to the pool controller to change to that color, and then the switch will turn off.

disabledLightColors.title: Disabled Colors
disabledLightColors.description: Disable any lights you don't want to create switches for. Only applicable if 'Create switches for light colors' is enabled.
